VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Oracle Systems relative to Starburst Enterprises?
SRP.A: Oracle Systems is {below} Starburst Enterprises in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Oracle Systems}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starburst Enterprises}.

VE.A: Oracle Systems's patent applications in 1997 is {6203.85} applications.

VE.A: Starburst Enterprises's patent applications in 2006 is {4286.38} applications.

VE.Q: What is Starburst Enterprises's Patent Applications in 2002?

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Patent Applications in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum patent applications is {3683.79} applications.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Patent Applications in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum patent applications is {10389.65} applications.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Patent Applications level recorded for Oracle Systems?
EVJ.A: Oracle Systems reached approximately {10389.65} applications in {2014}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Patent Applications level recorded for Oracle Systems?
EVJ.A: Oracle Systems's lowest recorded level is approximately {4838.98} applications in {1993}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Patent Applications?
SC.A: The average total patent applications is {12680.29} applications.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Patent Applications fall between 11906.43 and 13159.74 applications? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {12684.40} applications in {1999}, {12313.23} applications in {2006}, {12439.82} applications in {2000}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Patent Applications exceed 13800.80 applications? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {14040.82} applications in {2008}, {14921.72} applications in {2010}, {13849.16} applications in {2011}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Patent Applications go below 11265.38 applications? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {10955.42} applications in {1994}, {9805.03} applications in {1993}, {10134.79} applications in {1997}.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2013, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 1994 and 2009?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 1999 and 2013 was {smaller} than between 1994 and 2009.

NC.Q: Between 2006 and 2009, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 2000 and 2012?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 2006 and 2009 was {larger} than between 2000 and 2012.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 1996 higher or lower than in 2002?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 1996 was {lower} than in 2002.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 2002 higher or lower than in 2011?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 2002 was {lower} than in 2011.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Oracle Systems} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Starburst Enterprises, Oracle Systems}.
